channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024070656
item.description:
Report X-2024070656

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-11T18:15:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-26
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UNLOAD FOUND WET PACKAGE, CALLED FOR RESPONDER. RESPONDER RESPONDED, BROUGHT PACKAGE BACK TO PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. DISCOVERED AEROSOLS INSIDE THE PACKAGE. NOTED THAT THERE WAS NO LQ OR OTHER HAZARD LABEL ON BOX. NOTIFIED RMP AND FOLLOWED UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT POLICY.

item.title: Report X-2024070644
item.description:
Report X-2024070644

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-11T18:15:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-21
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: HAZMAT IN BUCKET WAS FOUND TO HAVE LEAKED FROM VENT HOLE. THE TOP OF LID WAS SOILED WITH PRODUCT. LEAKING HAZMAT PLACED ON HOLD PER RMP. ASSIGNED PROJECT REVIEWED PH OF 1 AND VENT CAP LEAKAGE AND ADVISED TO SOLIDIFY. RESPONDER DONNED FULL P.P.E WITH SILVER SHIELD LINERS PER CORROSIVE DECISION-TREE. SOLIDIFIED AND PROCESSED LEAKER.

item.title: Report X-2024070473
item.description:
Report X-2024070473

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-10T18:16:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-28
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER (DR) WAS CALLED TO RETRIEVE A LEAKING HAZARDOUS MATERIALS (HAZMAT) PACKAGE FROM THE UNLOAD AREA. DR RETRIEVED THE HAZMAT PACKAGE AND RETURNED WITH IT TO THE PACKAGE SERVICE CENTER (PSC) SOUTH CAGE. DR INSPECTED THE PACKAGE AND CONFIRMED LEAKAGE FROM THE INNER RECEPTICLE. AS PER THE WASTE DISPOSAL CHART, HAZMAT PACKAGE WAS DISPOSED USING THE DAMAGED MATERIALS PROGRAM STEPS.

  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER WENT TO RESPOND TO A LEAKER AT UNLOAD DOOR 9. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE WITH P.P.E ON AND NOTICE A CRUSHED HAZMAT PACKAGE BY DOOR 9. THE RESPONER FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE AND THE APPROPIATE RESPONSE SHEET.

item.title: Report X-2024070297
item.description:
Report X-2024070297

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-05T18:14:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-27
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER (DR) WAS TOLD TO RETRIEVE A LEAKING HAZARDOUS MATERIALS (HAZMAT) PACKAGE. DR RETRIEVED HAZMAT AND BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE PACKAGE SERVICE CENTER (PSC). DR INSPECTED THE HAZMAT PACKAGE ALONG WITH THE CONTENTS. DR DISCOVERED THAT THE HAZMAT PRODUCT HAD LEAKED INSIDE OF THE BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024070113
item.description:
Report X-2024070113

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-05T18:14:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-15
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DAMAGE INSPECTION; NON HAZARDOUS PRODUCT LEAKED; NO LEAK TO AEROSOL. RESPONDER WAS DISPATCHED TO SMALLS DEBAG. RETURNED WITH VARIOUS BATH BODY WORKS PACKAGES. WHILE PROCESSING THE PACKAGE, DISCOVERED THE PACKAGE CONTAINED AN AEROSOL, RESPONDER NOTED THE LACK OF APPROPRIATE HAZARD LABELS, AND SET PACKAGE ASIDE SO UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROCESS COULD BE FOLLOWED.
